org.fluidity.foundation

Class Generics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fluidity.foundation.Utility
      • org.fluidity.foundation.Generics

  • public final class Generics
extends Utility
    Utility methods to access parameterized type information.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Generics.Parameters
      Works around http://bugs.sun.com/view_bug.do?bug_id=5087240.

      static Generics.Parameters describe(Constructor<?> constructor)
      Creates and returns a constructor parameters descriptor that works around http://bugs.sun.com/view_bug.do?bug_id=5087240.

      Performs compatibility checks on the full generic type of a reference and the type of an object being assigned to it.

    • Method Detail

      • rawType

        public static Class<?> rawType(Type type)
        Returns the raw type, i.e., the class, corresponding to the given parameterized type.
        Parameters:
        type - the parameterized type.
        Returns:
        the raw type or null.

      • typeParameter

        public static Type typeParameter(Type type,
                                 int index)
        Returns the type parameter at the given index in the list of type parameters for the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the class or parameterized type.
        index - the index.
        Returns:
        the type parameter at the given index or null if the type is not a class or parameterized type, or the index is out of range.

      • arrayComponentType

        public static Type arrayComponentType(Type type)
        Returns the parameterized array component type of the given parameterized type.
        Parameters:
        type - the parameterized type.
        Returns:
        the array component type or null if the given type is not an array.

      • unresolved

        public static Type[] unresolved(Type reference)
        Returns a list of unresolved type variables in the given type.
        Parameters:
        reference - the type to scan for unresolved type variables and wild card types.
        Returns:
        an array of TypeVariable or WildcardType objects, or null if no unresolved variable was found.

      • abstractions

        public static Type abstractions(Type reference,
                                Function<Type,Type> inspector)
        Inspects the superclass and interfaces of reference and invokes inspector with each until it returns a type. Object.class is never passed to inspector. The inspector can invoke this method again to traverse the type's class hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        reference - the type to inspect the super and interfaces of.
        inspector - the inspector to invoke at every abstraction found.
        Returns:
        whatever the inspector returns; may be null.

      • propagate

        public static Type propagate(Type inbound,
                             Type outbound)
        Resolves all type variables of the outbound parameter using the inbound type as base type. The inbound type must have all its parameters resolved.
        Parameters:
        inbound - the base type to resolve type variables against.
        outbound - the outbound type whose type variables are to be resolved.
        Returns:
        a type with all type variables resolved or null if no resolution was possible.

      • toString

        public static String toString(boolean qualified,
                              Type argument)
        Returns a textual representation of the given type with complete type information.
        Parameters:
        qualified - if true, the type's fully qualified name is used, otherwise its simple name is used.
        argument - the generic type to convert to String.
        Returns:
        a textual representation of the given type with complete type information.

      • specializedType

        public static Type specializedType(Class specific,
                                   Class generic)
        Returns the type that the given specific class represents as the specialization of the generic type. If generic is a parameterized type, the returned type will have the corresponding type parameters present. The class of the returned type will be generic.
        Parameters:
        specific - the class that is assumed to specialize the given generic type.
        generic - the generic type that is expected to be specialized by the given specific.
        Returns:
        the type of the specific class that specializes the generic type; or null if the specific class is not a specialization of the generic type.

      • isAssignable

        public static boolean isAssignable(Type reference,
                                   Type type)
        Performs compatibility checks on the full generic type of a reference and the type of an object being assigned to it. This is a generalization of Class.isAssignableFrom(Class) to generic types.
        Parameters:
        reference - the reference to which an object is being assigned.
        type - the type of the object being assigned to the reference.
        Returns:
        true if the type is assignable to the

      • canonicalType

        public static Type canonicalType(Type type)

      • describe

        public static Generics.Parameters describe(Constructor<?> constructor)
        Creates and returns a constructor parameters descriptor that works around http://bugs.sun.com/view_bug.do?bug_id=5087240.
        Parameters:
        constructor - the constructor to describe the parameters of.
        Returns:
        a constructor parameters descriptor.
